nodes.text: The Dealer's Den was a cantina located in the far corner of the Concourse Lounges section of the Old Galactic Market on the planet Coruscant. It offered drinks, dancers and gambling as its entertainment. Most of its patrons were the seedier denizens of Coruscant society, like bounty hunters, spice dealers and smugglers to name a few.
Two years after the conclusion of the Jedi Civil War, the Jedi Revan met with the Mandalorian Canderous Ordo at the Dealer's Den.
During the Galactic War, the freelance spy known as The Shroud maintained a base in the back room of the cantina.
